content:
fitzgen closed issue #1071:

Would operations such as pow be expected to be added at some point? Which recommended operations from clause 9 of ieee 754-2008 will be added?

fitzgen commented on issue #1071:

Not planned at this time, we support the common denominator of supported platforms and what Wasm needs at this time. New issues discussing specific additions are welcome, if e.g. it is needed for cg-clif or someone is prepared to make a PR, but we don't need this old issue anymore.
